hero.title: Software & Data Engineer
hero.description: In software and data engineering projects, I develop scalable, performant and reliable systems with modern technologies. I create solutions that process, analyze and generate value from large datasets using Python, Golang, Docker and data pipelines.

about.title: About Me
about.description: My passion for software development and data engineering, combined with my desire to continuously learn and improve myself, drives me to do my best to produce scalable and effective solutions.
about.intro: Hello! I'm Veli Uluğut, a Computer Engineering graduate and working as a Software & Data Engineer.
about.experience: During my 5+ years of experience, I specialized in data engineering and software development projects and developed large-scale data systems with modern technologies.
about.skills: I particularly enjoy working with Python, Golang, Apache Airflow, Docker and Oracle technologies.
about.passion: Transforming large datasets into meaningful insights, optimizing ETL processes, and developing data-driven solutions are my biggest sources of motivation.
about.goal: My goal is to develop projects that improve business decision-making processes through data and add value.
